EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading the Containers and Pivotal Cloud Foundry white paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Containers and Pivotal Cloud Foundry white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you explore technology options for your digital transformation journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- Website: Pivotal Container Service (PKS): Enterprise-Grade Kubernetes <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pivotal-container-service]]> - Website: PKS Resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-container-service-pks]]> - Website: Containers Enable Consistent Deployment and Execution <[[https://pivotal.io/containers]]> - Blog: Adopting The runC Container Standard In Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/adopting-the-runc-container-standard-in-cloud-foundry]]> - Podcast: How do containers fall into your cloud-native planning? <[[https://content.pivotal.io/containers/pivotal-1770]]>
- Blog: How Cloud Foundry Gives Developers A Reliable Container Runtime <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/how-cloud-foundry-gives-developers-a-reliable-container-runtime]]> - Video: Moments in Container History <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/infographic/moments-container-history-video]]> - Document: Using Docker in Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/1-8/adminguide/docker.html]]> - Blog: 5 Confessions Of A Platform Builder <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/case-studies/5-confessions-of-a-platform-builder]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
